column9: Within an hour I took this medication and had severe stomach pains and diarrhea. It broke up the music but caused too much discomfort. I also have anxiety issues, and my heart began racing and I had a panic attack after dosage.

column2: flushingres, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I started taking this medication after coughing for a couple of days.  the first time it made me cough all night non-stop, losing sleep. For the next day I decided not to take it, and felt ok for a few hours. Just before bedtime, I decided to take a dosage, and immedietly begun to cough non-stop again.  I decided that I will no longer use this medication.

column2: I.Lau, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: it made me sick just minutes after I took it, very bad stomach pain, diarrhia, fever, I had to lay downnever again, I tossed the robitussin out and it took me 24 hours to recover from it

I had a massive amount of mucus sitting on my lungs obstructing my respiration. Since I don't have insurance, I went to the local drugstore and asked three pharmacist for her opinion, and she recommended robitussin. I felt such a relief, and I'm glad I took it. I can feel the inflammation going down and the phlegm also. Were I to be placed in a similar circumstance in the future, I would take it again.

column9: so far works for me i take once every year season weather changes so get screwed.. thanks to my doctor "Blanco" he recommended me this for years i always had lunch issues specially mucos will sick..A+++++++++

column2: jc, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I took a little more than 2 teaspoons because I could not stop coughing at night, I feel like I am dying with an overdose.  I can't breathe, I am hallucinating, my heart is pumping very fast and I can't drive.  I will have to call 911.  Do NOT take this medicine ever!

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I started going back to Robitussen because Mucinex (the miracle drug) just wasn't cutting it. It helped me keep working and improve without going into a more serious illness. Two thumbs up for the old Mom treatment. Thanks, Robitussin.

column2: Laura, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I took this medication for a cough with cold symptoms.  Within 24 hours, I developed nausea, diarrhea, and dizziness.  I couldn't get out of bed.  I have never felt so sick in my life.  It was scarey.  I stopped taking the cough medicine and it took two days for it to get out of my system and after that I felt fine.  Will never take any type of cough medicine again.
